entries.description: /review: Code fix automatically scrolls into view after generation.
Chat: improve font size and line-height in footer (below prompt input field)
Adds capability to send new context commands to AB groups
Chat: When writing a prompt without sending it, navigating via up/down arrows sometimes deletes the unsent prompt.
Fix chat not retaining history when interaction is through onboarding tab type (#5189)
Chat: When navigating to previous prompts, code attachments are sometimes displayed incorrectly
Reduce frequency of system information query
